name: Building oren
description:
The small village of Oren needs your help! Collect materials, craft tools, talk to your neightbours and gather resources! Grow the village!

INSTRUCTIONS

-WASD to move

-Mouse to move the camera

-SPACE to jump or interact

-ESC, E or ENTER to open the menu

-When on the menu, click on a tool to equip it.

Made for JamCraft4

Everything made by me except some textures.

-Made with Unity

-Models and animations made with Blender

-Music with Bosca Ceoil

-Sounds with ChipTone
